name: raycast-crosside-recently-codes
title: Crosside Recently Codes
description: A Raycast extension for listing recent projects from VSCode and its forks like Cursor and Windsurf.
author: jinghaihan

commands.name: index
commands.title: Search Recent Projects
commands.description: List recent projects from VSCode and its forks like Cursor and Windsurf.

preferences.name: editor
preferences.title: Editor
preferences.description: Open which build of Visual Studio Code to open when select a project.

preferences.name: layout
preferences.title: View Layout
preferences.description: Select the layout of the view

preferences.name: keepSectionOrder
preferences.title: Advanced
preferences.label: Keep Section Order
preferences.description: Keep the order of the sections while searching folders, files, etc.

preferences.name: terminalApp
preferences.title: Terminal App
preferences.description: Select which Terminal App to use when opening with a terminal

preferences.name: showGitBranch
preferences.title: Git Integration
preferences.label: Show Git Branch
preferences.description: Display the current Git branch for files and folders in Git repositories
